import { useState, useRef, useEffect } from 'react' import Cookies from 'js-cookie' import { useNavigate, Link } from "react-router-dom"; import mojoFace from '../assets/mojo-face.png'; export default function Register({ user, setUser }) { const form = useRef() const navigate = useNavigate(); const [isLoading, setIsLoading] = useState(false); const createUser = async (e) => { e.preventDefault(); try { let formData = new FormData(form.current); let req = await fetch("http://localhost:3000/signup", { method: "POST", body: formData, }); let res = await req.json(); if (req.ok) { console.log(res.user); Cookies.set("token", res.token); setUser(res.user); setIsLoading(true); } } catch (error) { setIsLoading(false); alert("The email has been taken"); } }; return( <>
